prompt:
Nurse: Hi, this is Rachel calling from O'Connor Hospital. I'm an AI on a recorded line. Is this Eredira Amador?

Patient: Yes.

Nurse: Thank you for confirming. Could you please provide your date of birth for verification purposes?

Patient: April fifth nineteen seventy one.

Nurse: Thank you for confirming your date of birth, Mr. Amador. I'm calling about your upcoming colonoscopy on August 17 at 11:00 AM. Is this a good time to talk?

Patient: Yes. This is fine.

Nurse: Great, thank you for your time, Mr. Amador. How has your day been so far?

Patient: Okay.

responses.gpt4: I'm glad to hear that. Getting into the reason for our call today, I see in your chart that you're scheduled for this colonoscopy due to blood in the stool. It can be quite a process to go through this procedure and I'm here to help you prepare. Can you share how you're feeling about it?
responses.our_model: I'm glad to hear that, Mr. Amador. Do you have any plans for the rest of the day?
